name: Nobodies
description:
Escape the room after you hide the body of the person who didn't.

Nobodies is a puzzle-filled adventure in resourcefulness. As the "cleaner" for a secret counter-terrorist operation, use your wits (and whatever you can find) to conceal all evidence of your employer's actions. Blend in, get out, and most importantly, leave no bodies behind.

Features
• Eleven challenging missions, each featuring a unique environment and means of "disposal".
• Countless brain-bending puzzles with just as many ways to fail (as a cleaner, discretion is everything).
• Nearly 100 distinctive, hand-drawn scenes to search and ponder.
• A thrilling narrative packed with intrigue.
• Based on a true story.
